title: A Dedicated Open Source Advocate and Valuable Member of Tech Twitter
description: I've had the pleasure of following Manish on Twitter for some time now and I cannot express enough how much his tweets, threads and open source advocacy have helped me in my own journey as a learner. His valuable information and insights have not only helped me in my work, but also inspired me to contribute more to the open source community. He is truly a role model for the tech community and I always look forward to reading his posts.
